member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ExtensionNodeTypes
member.summary: Defines IDs for built-in Server Explorer nodes that represent individual components on a SharePoint site, such as nodes that represent lists, fields, or content types.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ExtensionNodeTypes.ContentTypeNode
member.summary: Specifies the ID for nodes that represent a Microsoft.SharePoint.SPContentType.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ExtensionNodeTypes.FeatureNode
member.summary: Specifies the ID for nodes that represent a Microsoft.SharePoint.SPFeature.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ExtensionNodeTypes.FieldNode
member.summary: Specifies the ID for nodes that represent a Microsoft.SharePoint.SPField that is attached to a content type or list.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ExtensionNodeTypes.ListNode
member.summary: Specifies the ID for nodes that represent a Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ExtensionNodeTypes.ListTemplateNode
member.summary: Specifies the ID for nodes that represent a Microsoft.SharePoint.SPListTemplate.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ExtensionNodeTypes.ListViewNode
member.summary: Specifies the ID for nodes that represent a Microsoft.SharePoint.SPView.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ExtensionNodeTypes.WorkflowAssociationNode
member.summary: Specifies the ID for nodes that represent a Microsoft.SharePoint.Workflow.SPWorkflowAssociation.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ExtensionNodeTypes.WorkflowTemplateNode
member.summary: Specifies the ID for nodes that represent a Microsoft.SharePoint.Workflow.SPWorkflowTemplate.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.FeatureScope
member.summary: Specifies the scope of a Microsoft.SharePoint.SPFeature that a Server Explorer node represents.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.FeatureScope.Web
member.summary: The node represents a feature that has Web-level scope.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.FeatureScope.Site
member.summary: The node represents a feature that has site-level scope.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.FeatureScope.WebApplication
member.summary: The node represents a feature that has Web application-level scope.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.FeatureScope.Farm
member.summary: The node represents a feature that has farm-level scope.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IContentTypeNodeInfo
member.summary: Provides information about the content type (that is, the Microsoft.SharePoint.SPContentType) that is represented by a node in Server Explorer.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IContentTypeNodeInfo.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the content type.
member.returns: The name of the content type.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IFeatureNodeInfo
member.summary: Provides information about the Feature (that is, the Microsoft.SharePoint.SPFeature) that is represented by a node in Server Explorer.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IFeatureNodeInfo.Id
member.summary: Gets the ID of the feature.
member.returns: The ID of the feature.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IFeatureNodeInfo.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the feature.
member.returns: The name of the feature.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IFeatureNodeInfo.Scope
member.summary: Gets a value that represents the scope of the feature.
member.returns: The scope of the feature.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IFieldNodeInfo
member.summary: Provides information about the field (that is, the Microsoft.SharePoint.SPField) that is represented by a node in Server Explorer.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IFieldNodeInfo.ContentTypeName
member.summary: Gets the name of the content type that this field is associated with, if any.
member.returns: The name of the content type that this field is associated with

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IFieldNodeInfo.Id
member.summary: Gets the ID of the field.
member.returns: The ID of the field.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IFieldNodeInfo.IsHidden
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the field is hidden.
member.returns: true if the field is hidden; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IFieldNodeInfo.ListId
member.summary: Gets the ID of the list that this field is associated with, if any.
member.returns: The ID of the list that this field is associated with.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IFieldNodeInfo.Title
member.summary: Gets the name of the field.
member.returns: The name of the field.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IListNodeInfo
member.summary: Provides information about the list (that is, the Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList) that is represented by a node in Server Explorer.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IListNodeInfo.Category
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies the category that the list belongs to.
member.returns: The category that the list belongs to.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IListNodeInfo.DefaultViewUrl
member.summary: Gets the URL of the default view for the list.
member.returns: The URL of the default view for the list.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IListNodeInfo.Id
member.summary: Gets the ID of the list.
member.returns: The ID of the list.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IListNodeInfo.IsHidden
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the list is hidden.
member.returns: true if the list is hidden; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IListNodeInfo.Title
member.summary: Gets the title of the list.
member.returns: The title of the list.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IListTemplateNodeInfo
member.summary: Provides information about the list template (that is, the Microsoft.SharePoint.SPListTemplate) that is represented by a node in Server Explorer.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IListTemplateNodeInfo.Category
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies the category that the list template belongs to.
member.returns: The category that the list template belongs to.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IListTemplateNodeInfo.IsHidden
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the list template is hidden.
member.returns: true if the list template is hidden; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IListTemplateNodeInfo.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the list template.
member.returns: The name of the list template.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IListViewNodeInfo
member.summary: Provides information about the list view (that is, the Microsoft.SharePoint.SPView) that is represented by a node in Server Explorer.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IListViewNodeInfo.Id
member.summary: Gets the ID of the view.
member.returns: The ID of the view.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IListViewNodeInfo.ListId
member.summary: Gets the ID of the Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList that this view is associated with.
member.returns: The ID of the Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList that this view is associated with.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IListViewNodeInfo.Text
member.summary: Gets the text of the view.
member.returns: The text of the view.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IListViewNodeInfo.Url
member.summary: Gets the URL of the view.
member.returns: The URL of the view.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IWorkflowAssociationNodeInfo
member.summary: Provides information about the workflow association (that is, the Microsoft.SharePoint.Workflow.SPWorkflowAssociation) that is represented by a node in Server Explorer.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IWorkflowAssociationNodeInfo.Id
member.summary: Gets the ID of the workflow association.
member.returns: The ID of the workflow association.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IWorkflowAssociationNodeInfo.ListId
member.summary: Gets the ID of the Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList that the Microsoft.SharePoint.Workflow.SPWorkflowAssociation is attached to.
member.returns: The ID of the Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList that the Microsoft.SharePoint.Workflow.SPWorkflowAssociation is attached to.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IWorkflowAssociationNodeInfo.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the workflow association.
member.returns: The name of the workflow association.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IWorkflowTemplateNodeInfo
member.summary: Provides information about the workflow template (that is, the Microsoft.SharePoint.Workflow.SPWorkflowTemplate) that is represented by a node in Server Explorer.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IWorkflowTemplateNodeInfo.Id
member.summary: Gets the ID of the workflow template.
member.returns: The ID of the workflow template.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ListCategory
member.summary: Specifies the category of a Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList that a Server Explorer node represents.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ListCategory.DocumentLibrary
member.summary: The node represents a document library.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ListCategory.List
member.summary: The node represents a list.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ListTemplateCategory
member.summary: Specifies the category of a Microsoft.SharePoint.SPListTemplate that a Server Explorer node represents.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ListTemplateCategory.Other
member.summary: The node represents a list template of the Web Pages category.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ListTemplateCategory.Libraries
member.summary: The node represents a list template of the Libraries category.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ListTemplateCategory.Communications
member.summary: The node represents a list template of the Communications category.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ListTemplateCategory.Tracking
member.summary: The node represents a list template of the Tracking category.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ListTemplateCategory.CustomLists
member.summary: The node represents a list template of the Custom Lists category.
